groups.name: Structure
groups.description: Guidelines related to the structural elements of the article.

requirements.description: Articles about related proteins may be cross-linked by including one or more navigation boxes.
requirements.reference: Articles about related proteins may be cross linked by including one or more [[WP:NAVBOX|navigation boxes]] as appropriate.
requirements.when: Applicable when articles are about related proteins.

groups.name: Content
groups.description: Requirements related to the substantive content of the articles.

requirements.description: Include navigation boxes for cytoskeletal proteins.
requirements.when: Applicable for articles related to cytoskeletal proteins.

requirements.description: Include navigation boxes for ion channels.
requirements.when: Applicable for articles related to ion channels.

requirements.description: Include navigation boxes for transcription factors.
requirements.when: Applicable for articles related to transcription factors.

requirements.description: Include navigation boxes for transmembrane receptors.
requirements.when: Applicable for articles related to transmembrane receptors.
